/>
II.i.1.A.1.b
.
Roles and Responsibilities in the CM Process
The intake processing center (IPC) is responsible for initial screening, control, and uploading to the appropriate eFolder of mail received in the CM portal.
Reference
:  For more information on IPC roles and responsibilities, see
M21-1, Part I, Subpart ii, 1.A.1.b
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Centralized Mail (CM) Intake
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
